articles.description: CSK captain MS Dhoni said it is hard to replace someone like Ravindra Jadeja as he allows the team management to play different combinations based on situations.
articles.content: Reacting on Ravindra Jadeja's absence for the final three matches of Chennai Super Kings in IPL 2022 due to an injury, captain MS Dhoni said it is hard to replace someone like Jadeja as he allows the… [+1805 chars]

articles.author: Yasmin Syed
articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz lists what he'd steal from Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer - Express
articles.description: CARLOS ALCARAZ recently defeated Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal back-to-back.
articles.content: Carlos Alcaraz has revealed what traits he’d steal from each of the Big Three. The 19-year-old became the first man ever to beat Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal back-to-back on a clay court in Madrid… [+2226 chars]
